name: Particles
description: Create a spray of particles.  Useful for visual effects.

conditions.name: Is spraying
conditions.description: True if the continuous spray is currently enabled.

actions.name: Set blend mode
actions.description: Set the background blend mode for this object.

params.name: Blend mode
params.description: Choose the new blend mode for this object.

actions.name: Set speed
actions.description: Set the initial particle speed.

params.name: Speed
params.description: Initial particle speed, in pixels per second.

actions.name: Set size
actions.description: Set the initial size of each particle.

params.name: Size
params.description: Initial size of each particle, in pixels.

actions.name: Set opacity
actions.description: Set the initial particle opacity.

params.name: Opacity
params.description: Initial opacity of each particle, from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

actions.name: Set grow rate
actions.description: Set the initial particle grow rate.

params.name: Grow rate
params.description: Rate the size changes over time, in pixels per second.

actions.name: Set X randomiser
actions.description: Set the initial particle X randomiser.
actions.display_text: Set initial particle X randomiser to [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: X randomiser
params.description: Random X co-ordinate offset on creation.

actions.name: Set Y randomiser
actions.description: Set the initial particle Y randomiser.
actions.display_text: Set initial particle Y randomiser to [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: Y randomiser
params.description: Random Y co-ordinate offset on creation.

actions.name: Set speed randomiser
actions.description: Set the random addition to particle speed on creation.
actions.display_text: Set initial particle speed randomiser to [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: Speed randomiser
params.description: Random addition to particle speed on creation.

actions.name: Set size randomiser
actions.description: Set the random addition to particle size on creation.
actions.display_text: Set initial particle size randomiser to [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: Size randomiser
params.description: Random addition to particle size on creation.

actions.name: Set grow rate randomiser
actions.description: Set the random addition to particle grow rate on creation.
actions.display_text: Set initial particle grow rate randomiser to [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: Grow rate randomiser
params.description: Random addition to particle grow rate on creation.

actions.name: Set acceleration
actions.description: Set the particle acceleration.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: Particle acceleration, in pixels per second per second.

actions.name: Set gravity
actions.description: Set the force of gravity.

params.name: Gravity
params.description: Force of gravity, in pixels per second per second.

actions.name: Set angle randomiser
actions.description: Set the random angle deflection over time.

params.name: Angle randomiser
params.description: Random angle deflection over time.

actions.name: Set speed randomiser
actions.description: Set the random speed adjustment over time.

params.name: Speed randomiser
params.description: Random speed adjustment over time.

actions.name: Set opacity randomiser
actions.description: Set the random opacity adjustment over time.

params.name: Opacity randomiser
params.description: Random opacity adjustment over time.

actions.name: Set timeout
actions.description: Set the destroy timeout or fade to invisible time.

params.name: Timeout
params.description: Time in seconds for timeout or fade to invisible (depending on destroy mode).

actions.name: Set spraying
actions.description: Enable or disable the continuous spray.

params.name: State
params.description: Whether or not the spray is currently enabled.

actions.name: Set rate
actions.description: Set the number of particles created per second.

params.name: Rate
params.description: Number of particles to create per second.

actions.name: Set spray cone
actions.description: Set the number of degrees through which particles are created.

params.name: Spray cone
params.description: Number of degrees through which particles are created.

actions.name: Set particle object
actions.description: Set an object to spawn as particles instead of using the particle image.

params.name: Particle object
params.description: The object to spawn as particles.

actions.name: Unset particle object
actions.description: Remove any object set to spawn as particles, reverting back to using the particle image.

actions.name: Fast-forward
actions.description: Skip the particle effect forwards in time. Useful for preparing an initial particle effect.

params.name: Time
params.description: The amount of time in seconds to advance the particle effect by.

expressions.name: InitSpeed
expressions.description: The initial particle speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: InitSize
expressions.description: The initial particle size, in pixels.

expressions.name: InitOpacity
expressions.description: The initial particle opacity, from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

expressions.name: InitGrowRate
expressions.description: The initial particle grow rate, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: XRandom
expressions.description: The random X offset on creation.

expressions.name: YRandom
expressions.description: The random Y offset on creation.

expressions.name: InitSpeedRandom
expressions.description: The random addition to particle speed on creation.

expressions.name: InitSizeRandom
expressions.description: The random addition to particle size on creation.

expressions.name: InitGrowRandom
expressions.description: The random addition to particle grow rate on creation.

expressions.name: ParticleAcceleration
expressions.description: The particle acceleration in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: Gravity
expressions.description: The force of gravity in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: ParticleAngleRandom
expressions.description: The maximum random angle deflection in degrees per second.

expressions.name: ParticleSpeedRandom
expressions.description: The maximum random change in speed in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: ParticleOpacityRandom
expressions.description: The maximum change in opacity per second.

expressions.name: Timeout
expressions.description: The destroy or fade to invisible timeout.

expressions.name: Rate
expressions.description: The number of particles created per second.

expressions.name: SprayCone
expressions.description: The number of degrees through which particles are created.
